description:
Weather protection for all four seasons. These bibs use an incredibly durable shell fabric with mechanical 2-way stretch, so you are free to carve, kick turn or high step without restrictions. The Atmos™ membrane is hydrophilic, not micro-porous, meaning breathability won't be compromised when the jacket gets dirty. Harness-compatible pockets, 3/4-length vents and reinforced kick patches round out this backcountry staple.

  • Durable Loop Hardshell™ ripstop polyester has 70% recycled content
  • Atmos™ waterproof-breathable membrane repels moisture
  • Fully taped seams and fluorocarbon-free DWR finish keep wetness from seeping in
  • 3/4-length zippered vents let you release heat when you're working hard
  • Waterproof zippers
  • Thigh pockets positioned to allow access when wearing a harness
  • Integrated gaiters layer securely over boots
  • Schoeller reinforced kickpatches protect against sharp edges
  • Should this garment wear out after years of use, it can be returned to Houdini for recycling
name: Houdini RollerCoaster Pants - Women's

value: ¾-length leg zips with storm flap
